description:
This skill will give Alexa access to over 12,000 cocktail recipes. When you ask her what's in a cocktail, she will give you the ingredients, the amounts, and the instructions for mixing the ingredients together. If you have some ingredients and are looking for inspiration, you can ask her for drink that's made with your ingredient. If you're feeling adventurous, you can also ask Alexa to surprise you for a random drink recipe.

NOTICE:
This skill may not be suitable for all ages. This skill provides instructions for how to make alcoholic drinks, in addition, some drink recipes returned by Alexa may include offensive content.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask the bartender, what's in a Tom Collins?
Alexa, ask the bartender, for a drink with pineapple juice
Alexa, ask the bartender to surprise me
name: The Bartender
shortDescription: Gives Alexa access to over 12,000 cocktail recipes and instructions on how to make them. You can now ask for a recipe by name, or by ingredients!
